DOC.brief_summary: This cross sectional study novel non-invasive optical flare photometer ( OFAM ) . Patients meet inclusion/exclusion criterion receive standard eye examination include slit lamp examination collect ocular flare data . In addition standard eye examination , subject receive flare measurement use OFAM device .
DOC.criteria: Age great 18 year Ability understand willingness sign write informed consent document . To eligible uveitis arm study subject must active anterior chamber uveitis one eye determine physician To eligible noninflammatory arm study study subject must ocular inflammation either eye determine physician . Inability give inform consent Exclusion criterion uveitis arm : active disease Exclusion criterion noninflammatory arm : Signs uveitis
